resources.string: Welcome to the Shoe Store. This app allows you to browse previusly saved shoe and also add new ones.\n\nClick on the Instruction button to go to the Instruction Page.

This page gives you instruction on how to use this application

Click on the Shoe list button to get to the Shoe list page.

To add a new shoe, click on the add(+) button which brings you the new shoe page where you can fill out the form and click Save
